Question: In January 1990, this person starred with Jean Stapleton in the TV situation comedy Bagdad Cafe.
Hints: While on Broadway, this person's performance caught the eye of director Steven Spielberg.
In 2009, this person won the Daytime Emmy Award for Outstanding Talk Show Host for her role on The View.
This person has a Grammy, two Daytime Emmys, two Golden Globes, a Tony (for production, not acting), and an Oscar.
